name: Chemical Recycling Europe
goal: Chemical Recycling Europe (ChemRecEurope) was established in 2019 to promote and implement the innovative solutions that the chemical recycling of plastic waste offers to benefit our economy and society. ChemRecEurope represents the interest of the European chemical recycling industry towards the public and European institutions. Chemical recycling technologies play a decisive role in closing the loop and supporting the transition towards a more sustainable and circular economy in Europe.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Plastics recycling
Environmental policy
International Trade
EU Waste Acquis
Energy efficiency
Health & safety
